Detailed Description

The Watchtower core class.

This class holds all information about Watchtower. This includes configurations, and all other components integrated into the Watchtower core. Normally you would create an instance of wtCore and fill it with the required information. However, in most cases the function wtInit() will suit the needs in automating these processes. If you are interested in the details of the initialization process, wtMain.php might be a good resource.

See also:
wtInit() wtMain.php
